column1: event,"<center>this has been my personal layout for the last few months, and now i am retiring it to you guys. it's based off the book ""invisible montsters,"" and one of my favorites I've ever made. i hope no one minds the J embeded into it, it stands for the first letter of my name. but most say it's not too noticable.
<b>please upload all images to your own server.
in other words, DON'T USE MY BANDWIDTH.
copy and paste this into your overrides box, replacing ""HEADER URL"" and ""BACKGROUND URL"" with the image URLs after they are uploaded onto your server.
div table table table { width: auto
div table table table table { width: 100%
/* change these numbers, must add up to 95% or less*/
your journal should be set to ""generator"" on all pages,
and your settings bar should look like this:
if you use this layout, please leave a comment. i just like to keep track of how popular they are and how many people are using them.
also, it's greatly apprecited if you take a button code from my user info page and paste it into your own! please consider the work i put into these and be polite. thank you!
<font color=red><b>ALL LAYOUTS AND GRAPHICS ARE MADE BY ME, SO PLEASE. DON'T USE THE GRAPHICS FOR ANYTHING ELSE. THANK YOU.</font></center>"

event,"<center>i'm loving the clean and simple thing. trish, sorry if it's too plain for you. but hey. i did my thang. hope you like it. (i swear i'm not as big of a video game nerd as the girl i made this for!) but hey, if you've played kingdom hearts and liked it, here's for you. and if you haven't played kingdom hearts... you should. duh.
<b>please upload all images to your own server.
in other words, DON'T USE MY BANDWIDTH.

event,"<center>here's a clean and simple jason mraz layout i threw together. his fans are one crowd i was eager to have something to offer. (incase you didn't know, mraz fans are definately the coolest fans of any artist. ever.) so here it is. enjoy!
**NOTE** this is compatible with all resolutions, however i believe it will fit best on 1024 x 768. the background is a bit wide set.
<b>please upload all images to your own server.
in other words, DON'T USE MY BANDWIDTH.

event,"<center>if anyone out there watches smallville and is as huge of a diehard lex luthor fan as me, this one is for you.

**NOTE** first of all, the banner on the bottom with my old livejournal URL has been removed, so no worries. second of all, be aware that this entry is not compatible with all screen resolutions. while it will stay centered, the width of the entry boxes may differ from the width of the header.

event,"welcome friends! this is a journal full of layouts i've designed and made, posted for you to take. free! with nothing requested other than a comment / credit.
none up soon, but i already have several stored up for when i get around to posting them.

feel free to leave a comment with any layout requests. yes, i do custom jobs. i'm afraid i do have limitations, however. i don't like working with entry scrollboxes AT ALL. i would probably have to really like your idea in order to go for it. they're pretty much just a pain in my ass. but i do pretty much everything else.
once again, all the layout posted here are made by me, so any of the styles you see done here, i am capable of doing it."
